text:
She has been out of the limelight for some months, in the wake of being charged with petty theft and spending time in rehab.
But it seems Kim Richards has been busy while she has been off radar, filming a new reality show.
The former Real Housewife of Beverly Hills will soon be seen starring in The Mother/ Daughter Experiment: Celebrity Edition.
Scroll down for video
Emotional: Former former Real Housewife of Beverly Hills Kim Richards will soon be seen starring in The Mother/ Daughter Experiment: Celebrity Edition alongside daughter Kimberly
Kim, 51, is appearing on the show with her daughter Kimberly Jackson.
And the pair will not be alone when it comes to celebrity moms and their offspring - they will be joined by a host of reality stars.
Heidi Montag will be on the program with her mother Darlene Egelhoff, as well as Courtney Stodden and her mom Krista.
Tough talk: The pair are seen getting emotional on the show

Shar Jackson and her daughter Cassie.
Jessica Canseco, from Hollywood Exe's, and her daughter, Josie, are also starring.
Therapy: The six sets of mothers and daughters work with therapist Dr. Debbie Magids over eight weeks
Appearance: Courtney Stodden (L) will be on the program with her mum Krista (R)
Appearance: Shar Jackson will be on the show with her daughter Cassie
Good ocmpany? Bad Girls Club star Natalie Nunn makes an appearance
Argument: She and her mother Karen are seen at loggerheads
The six sets of celebrity mothers and daughters work with therapist Dr. Debbie Magids over eight weeks.
The aim is with the help of discussion and intensive therapy they can mend their broken relationships.
It is clear tempers and emotions run high while the women and their daughters are working through their issues.
Open: Jessica Canseco, from Hollywood Exe's, and her daughter, Josie, are also starring
Reality royalty? Heidi Montag (centre) is also on the program
Letting it out: Her mother Darlene Egelhoff gets some things off her chest
In a clip from the show, Kim can be seen in a shouting match with Kimberly, saying: 'Don't tell me what to do, I'm defending myself!'
Later her daughter can be seen weeping as she tells her mom: 'I want you to stay healthy always.'
Kim, who has four children, including Brooke, 29, Whitney, 25, and Chad, 24, had a turbulent 2015 - it saw her continue to struggle with sobriety, as well as being charged with trespassing, resisting an officer and battery on a police officer in April.
Hot headed: In a clip from the show, Kim can be seen in a shouting match with Kimberly, saying: 'Don't tell me what to do, I'm defending myself!'
Dagger drawn: It's clear she's not the only person she falls out with
Then in August she was charged with petty theft after she was arrested for shoplifting at Target in Van Nuys.
Earlier this week, Kim was left devastated after the death of her ex-husband Monty Brinson at the age 58, after his battle with cancer.
The Mother/ Daughter Experiment: Celebrity Edition, will air on Lifetime in March.
